issue.title: [R] Remove args from FeatherReader$create
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11912](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11912). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
They aren't used anymore because FeatherReader$create() now requires that you provide it a file connection. (We leaked connections before when it accepted a string file path and opened a connection if needed.)
